channel.title: What is Open Government?
channel.description: What is Open Government? - Chris Birk

item.title: Open Source
item.description: According to Wikipedia, Open Source refers to a program in which the source control is available to the general public for use and/or modification from its original design.

item.title: Open Data
item.description: Wikipedia defines ‘Open Data’ as the idea that certain data should be freely available to everyone to use and republish as they wish, without restrictions from copyright, patents or other mechanisms of control.
